Name: limit_total_budget
Description: Project budget must not exceed the cap

Name: require_active_backlog
Description: Product Backlog must be in an active/usable state

Name: require_high_priority_epics
Description: Selected epics must meet a minimum priority

Name: exclude_resolved_blockers
Description: Resolved blockers must not count as active scope

Name: require_scrum_master_experience
Description: Scrum Master needs minimum experience level

Name: team_size_within_bounds
Description: Team size should remain within acceptable limits

Name: limit_task_effort
Description: Each task effort should not exceed the threshold

Name: require_sprint_goal
Description: Each sprint must define a goal

Name: cap_backlog_entries
Description: Backlog must not exceed maximum entries

Name: limit_sprint_planning_duration
Description: Sprint Planning duration must stay within timebox
